subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy led the final round of the P.G.A. Championship from start to finish, crushing an elite field to win by eight strokes — the largest margin in the tournament’s 94-year history.
snippet: Rory McIlroy led the final round of the P.G.A. Championship from start to finish, crushing an elite field to win by eight strokes — the largest margin in the tournament’s 94-year history.
